Description: Clay tablet; complete; division of an estate; oath by Shamash and "Am-mi-su-ra"; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.247)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
